mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a minimum security policy and cipher suite of TLSv1.2 or greater for viewer connections. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a CloudFront distribution if the minimumProtocolVersion is below TLSv1.2_2018.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are using a custom SSL certiﬁcate and are conﬁgured to use SNI to serve HTTPS requests. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a customSSL certiﬁcate is associated but the SSL support method is a dedicated IP address.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a server created with AWS Transfer Family does not use FTP for endpoint connection. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the server protocol for endpoint connection is FTP-enabled.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudFront distributions are not using deprecated SSL protocols for HTTPS communication between CloudFront edge locations and custom origins. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a CloudFront distribution if any'OriginSslProtocols' includes'SSLv3'.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are encrypting traﬃc to custom origins. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'OriginProtocolPolicy' is 'http-only' or if 'OriginProtocolPolicy' is 'match-viewer' and 'ViewerProtocolPolicy' is 'allow-all'.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your Amazon CloudFront distributions use HTTPS (directly or via a redirection). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the value of ViewerProtocolPolicy is set to 'allow-all' for the DefaultCacheBehavior or for the CacheBehaviors.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon API Gateway APIs are of the type speciﬁed in the rule parameter 'endpointConﬁgurationType'. The rule returns NON_COMPLIANT if the REST API does not match the endpoint type conﬁgured in the rule parameter.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are associated with either web application ﬁrewall (WAF) or WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution is not associated with a WAF web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the certiﬁcate associated with an Amazon CloudFront distribution is not the defaultSSL certiﬁcate. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution uses the default SSL certiﬁcate.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS Network Firewall policy is conﬁgured with a user deﬁned stateless default action for fragmented packets. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if stateless default action for fragmented packets does not match with user deﬁned default action.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) DB security groups is the default one. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are any DB security groups that are not the defaultDB security group.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) Transit Gateways do not have 'AutoAcceptSharedAttachments' enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a Transit Gateway if 'AutoAcceptSharedAttachments' is set to 'enable'.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) endpoint is not publicly accessible. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the endpoint is publicly accessible.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: For this rule, the rule identiﬁer (INCOMING_SSH_DISABLED) and rule name (restricted-ssh) are diﬀerent. Ensure that the incomingSSH traﬃc for the security groups is accessible. The rule is COMPLIANT if the IP addresses of the incoming SSH traﬃc in the security groups are restricted (CIDR other than 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0). Otherwise, NON_COMPLIANT.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS AppSync APIs are associated with AWS WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an AWS AppSync API if it is not associated with a web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are not public. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are public.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Bitbucket source repository URL DOES NOT contain sign-in credentials or not. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the URL contains any sign-in information and COMPLIANT if it doesn't.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Classic Load Balancers use SSL certiﬁcates provided by AWS Certiﬁcate Manager. To use this rule, use an SSL or HTTPS listener with your Classic Load Balancer. Note- this rule is only applicable to Classic Load Balancers. This rule does not check Applicati on Load Balancers and Network Load Balancers.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an account with Amazon EMR has block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if BlockPublicSecurityGroupRules is false, or if true, ports other than Port 22 are listed in Permitted PublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that default ports for SSH/RDP ingress traﬃc for network access control lists (NACLs) are restricted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a NACL inbound entry allowsa source TCP or UDP CIDR block for ports22 or 3389.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAF Global Web ACL contains someWAF rules or rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF Classic rule group contains some rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules present within a rule group.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF global rule contains some conditions. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no conditions are present within the WAF global rule.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the AWS Client VPN authorization rules does not authorize connection access for all clients. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'AccessAll' is present and set to true.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that internet gateways are attached to an authorized virtual private cloud (Amazon VPC). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if internet gateways are attached to an unauthorized VPC.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon S3 access points have block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if block public access settings are not enabled for S3 access points.

mappings.control_description: Network security controls (NSCs) are conﬁgured and maintained. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Neptune DB cluster has snapshots encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Neptune cluster does not have snapshots encrypted.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Redshift clusters are using a speciﬁed AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS)key for encryption. The rule is COMPLIANT if encryption is enabled and the cluster is encrypted with the key provided in the kmsKeyArn parameter. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the cluster is not encrypted or encrypted with another key.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS CodeBuild project has encryption enabled for all of its artifacts. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'encryptionDisabled' is set to 'true' for any primary or secondary(if present) artifact conﬁgurations.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS CodeBuild project conﬁgured with Amazon S3 Logs has encryption enabled for its logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'encryptionDisabled' is set to 'true' in a S3LogsConﬁg of a CodeBuild project.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon DynamoDB Accelerat or (DAX) clusters are encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a DAX cluster is not encrypted.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that all methods in Amazon API Gateway stages have cache enabled and cache encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any method in an Amazon API Gateway stage is not conﬁgured to cache or the cache is not encrypted.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that storage encryption is enabled for your Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibi lity) clusters. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if storage encryption is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the project DOES NOT contain environment variables AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT when the project environment variables contains plaintext credentials.

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Primary account number (PAN) is secured wherever it is stored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudFront distributions are not using deprecated SSL protocols for HTTPS communication between CloudFront edge locations and custom origins. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a CloudFront distribution if any'OriginSslProtocols' includes'SSLv3'.

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are encrypting traﬃc to custom origins. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'OriginProtocolPolicy' is 'http-only' or if 'OriginProtocolPolicy' is 'match-viewer' and 'ViewerProtocolPolicy' is 'allow-all'.

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your Amazon CloudFront distributions use HTTPS (directly or via a redirection). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the value of ViewerProtocolPolicy is set to 'allow-all' for the DefaultCacheBehavior or for the CacheBehaviors.

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Classic Load Balancers use SSL certiﬁcates provided by AWS Certiﬁcate Manager. To use this rule, use an SSL or HTTPS listener with your Classic Load Balancer. Note- this rule is only applicable to Classic Load Balancers. This rule does not check Applicati on Load Balancers and Network Load Balancers.

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your Amazon DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) cluster has ClusterEndpointEncryptionType set to TLS. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a DAX cluster is not encrypted by transport layer security (TLS).

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon MSK cluster enforces encryption in transit using HTTPS (TLS) with the broker nodes of the cluster. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if plain text communication is enabled for in- cluster broker node connections.

mappings.control_description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) endpoints are conﬁgured with anSSL connection. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if AWS DMS does not have an SSL connection conﬁgured.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon API Gateway V2 stages have access logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'accessLogSettings' is not present in Stage conﬁguration.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. The rule is COMPLIANT if X-Ray tracing is enabled and NON_COMPLIANT otherwise.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are conﬁgured to deliver access logs to an Amazon S3 bucket. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution does not have logging conﬁgured.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that there is at least one AWS CloudTrail trail defined with security best practices. This rule is COMPLIANT if there is at least one trail that meets all of the following: records global service events, is a multi-region trail, has Log file validation enabled, encrypted with a KMS key, records events for reads and writes, records management events, does not exclude any management events.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Neptune cluster has CloudWatch log export enabled for audit logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Neptune cluster does not have CloudWatch log export enabled for audit logs.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that logConﬁguration is set on active ECS Task Deﬁnitions. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an active ECSTaskDeﬁnition does not have the logConﬁguration resource deﬁned or the value for logConﬁguration is null in at least one container deﬁnition.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: For this rule, the rule identiﬁer (CLOUD_TRAIL_ENABLED) and rule name (cloudtrail- enabled) are diﬀerent. Ensure that an AWS CloudTrail trail is enabled in your AWS account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a trail is not enabled. Optionally, the rule checks a speciﬁc S3 bucket, Amazon Simple Notiﬁcation Service (Amazon SNS) topic, and CloudWatch log group.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: for this rule, the rule identiﬁer (MULTI_REGION_CLOUD_TRAIL_ENABLED) and rule name (multi-region-clou dtrail-enabled) are diﬀerent. Ensure that there is at leastone multi-region AWS CloudTrail. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the trails do not match input parameters. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the ExcludeManagementEventSources ﬁeld is not empty or if AWS CloudTrail is conﬁgured to exclude management events such as AWS KMS events or Amazon RDS DataAPI events.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS AppSync API has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging is not enabled, or 'ﬁeldLogLevel' is neither ERROR nor ALL.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that logging is enabled on AWS WAF classic global web access control lists (web ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a global web ACL, if it does not have logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon MQ brokers have Amazon CloudWatch audit logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a broker does not have audit logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon MQ broker has CloudWatch audit logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the broker does not have audit logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is conﬁgured with logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging for Amazon EKS clusters is not enabled for alllog types.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Elastic Beanstalk environments are conﬁgured to send logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the valueof `StreamLogs` is false.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Step Functions machine has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a state machine does not have logging enabled or the logging conﬁguration is not at the minimum level provided.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Network Firewall ﬁrewalls have logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a logging type is not conﬁgured. You can specify which logging type you want the rule to check.

mappings.control_description: Anti-malware mechanisms and processes are active, maintained, and monitored. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon CloudWatch LogGroup retention period is set to greater than 365 days or else a speciﬁed retention period. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the retention period is less than MinRetentionTime, if speciﬁed, or else 365 days.

mappings.control_description: Security vulnerabi lities are identiﬁed and addressed. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the AWS Lambda function settings for runtime, role, timeout, and memory size match the expected values. The rule ignores functions with the 'Image' package type and functions with runtime set to 'OS-onlyRuntime'. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Lambda function settings do not match the expected values.

mappings.control_description: Security vulnerabi lities are identiﬁed and addressed. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) cluster is not running the oldest supported version. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an EKS cluster is running oldest supported version (equal to the parameter 'oldestVersionSupported').

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are associated with either web application ﬁrewall (WAF) or WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution is not associated with a WAF web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS AppSync APIs are associated with AWS WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an AWS AppSync API if it is not associated with a web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAFv2Web ACL containsany WAF rules or WAF rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rules or WAF rule groups.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that WAFv2 Rule Groups contain rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules in a WAFv2 Rule Group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAF Global Web ACL contains someWAF rules or rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF Classic rule group contains some rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules present within a rule group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF global rule contains some conditions. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no conditions are present within the WAF global rule.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are associated with either web application ﬁrewall (WAF) or WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution is not associated with a WAF web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS AppSync APIs are associated with AWS WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an AWS AppSync API if it is not associated with a web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAFv2Web ACL containsany WAF rules or WAF rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rules or WAF rule groups.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that WAFv2 Rule Groups contain rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules in a WAFv2 Rule Group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAF Global Web ACL contains someWAF rules or rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF Classic rule group contains some rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules present within a rule group.

mappings.control_description: Public-facing web applications are protected against attacks. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF global rule contains some conditions. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no conditions are present within the WAF global rule.

mappings.control_description: Changes to all system components are managed securely. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the deployment group for Lambda Compute Platform is not using the default deployment conﬁguration. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the deployment group is using the deployment conﬁguration 'CodeDeployDefault.LambdaAllAtOnce'.

mappings.control_description: Changes to all system components are managed securely. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the ﬁrst deployment stage of AWS CodePipeline performs at least one deployment. This is to monitor continuous deployment activity, ensuring regular updates and identifying inactive or underutilized pipelines, which can signal issues in the development or deployment process. Optionally ensure that eachof the subsequent remaining stages deploy to more than the speciﬁed numberof deployments (deploymentLimit).

mappings.control_description: Changes to all system components are managed securely. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the deployment group for Lambda Compute Platform is not using the default deployment conﬁguration. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the deployment group is using the deployment conﬁguration 'CodeDeployDefault.LambdaAllAtOnce'.

mappings.control_description: Changes to all system components are managed securely. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the ﬁrst deployment stage of AWS CodePipeline performs at least one deployment. This is to monitor continuous deployment activity, ensuring regular updates and identifying inactive or underutilized pipelines, which can signal issues in the development or deployment process. Optionally ensure that eachof the subsequent remaining stages deploy to more than the speciﬁed numberof deployments (deploymentLimit).

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket policy does not allow blocklisted bucket-level and object-level actions on resources in the bucket for principals from other AWS accounts. For example, the rule checks that the Amazon S3 bucket policy does not allow another AWS account to perform any s3:GetBucket* actions and s3:DeleteObject on any object in the bucket. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any blocklisted actions are allowed by the Amazon S3 bucket policy.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) bucket policies do not allow other inter- account permissions than the control Amazon S3 bucket policy that you provide.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Shield Response Team (SRT) can access your AWS account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if AWS Shield Advanced is enabled but the role for SRT access is not conﬁgured.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that anIAM policy ARN is attached to an IAM user, or a group with one or more IAM users, or an IAM role with one or more trusted entity.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Neptune cluster has AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) database authentication enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon Neptune cluster does not have IAM database authentication enabled.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) cluster has AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an Amazon RDS Cluster does not have IAM authentication enabled.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an EC2 instance has an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) proﬁle attached to it. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no IAM proﬁle is attached to the EC2 instance.

mappings.control_description: Access to system components and data is appropriately deﬁned and assigned. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a backup vault has an attached resource-based policy which prevents deletion of recovery points. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Backup Vault does not have resource- based policies or has policies withouta suitable 'Deny' statement (statement with backup:DeleteRecoveryPoint, backup:UpdateRecoveryPointLifecycle, and backup:PutBackupVaultAccess Policy permissions).

The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the cluster is not encrypted or encrypted with another key.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS CodeBuild project has encryption enabled for all of its artifacts. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'encryptionDisabled' is set to 'true' for any primary or secondary(if present) artifact conﬁgurations.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS CodeBuild project conﬁgured with Amazon S3 Logs has encryption enabled for its logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'encryptionDisabled' is set to 'true' in a S3LogsConﬁg of a CodeBuild project.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon DynamoDB Accelerat or (DAX) clusters are encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a DAX cluster is not encrypted.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS) endpoints for Redis data stores are enabled for TLS/SSL encryption of data communicated with other endpoints. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if TLS/SSL encryption is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service clusters are conﬁgured to have Kubernetes secrets encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) keys.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that all methods in Amazon API Gateway stages have cache enabled and cache encrypted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any method in an Amazon API Gateway stage is not conﬁgured to cache or the cache is not encrypted.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that storage encryption is enabled for your Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibi lity) clusters. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if storage encryption is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Strong authentication for users and administrators is established and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Neptune manual DB cluster snapshot is not public. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any existing and new Neptune cluster snapshot is public.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are not public. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are public.

mappings.guidance: Ensure that a backup vault has an attached resource-based policy which prevents deletion of recovery points. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the Backup Vault does not have resource- based policies or has policies withouta suitable 'Deny' statement (statement with backup:DeleteRecoveryPoint, backup:UpdateRecoveryPointLifecycle, and backup:PutBackupVaultAccess Policy permissions).

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an account with Amazon EMR has block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if BlockPublicSecurityGroupRules is false, or if true, ports other than Port 22 are listed in Permitted PublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon S3 access points have block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if block public access settings are not enabled for S3 access points.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the required public access block settings are conﬁgured from account level. The rule is only NON_COMPLIANT when the ﬁelds set below do not match the corresponding ﬁelds in the conﬁguration item.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that MFA Delete is enabled in the Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket versioning conﬁgura tion. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if MFA Delete is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon API Gateway APIs are of the type speciﬁed in the rule parameter 'endpointConﬁgurationType'. The rule returns NON_COMPLIANT if the REST API does not match the endpoint type conﬁgured in the rule parameter.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are associated with either web application ﬁrewall (WAF) or WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution is not associated with a WAF web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the certiﬁcate associated with an Amazon CloudFront distribution is not the defaultSSL certiﬁcate. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution uses the default SSL certiﬁcate.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS Network Firewall policy is conﬁgured with a user deﬁned stateless default action for fragmented packets. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if stateless default action for fragmented packets does not match with user deﬁned default action.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) DB security groups is the default one. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are any DB security groups that are not the defaultDB security group.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) Transit Gateways do not have 'AutoAcceptSharedAttachments' enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a Transit Gateway if 'AutoAcceptSharedAttachments' is set to 'enable'.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) endpoint is not publicly accessible. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the endpoint is publicly accessible.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: For this rule, the rule identiﬁer (INCOMING_SSH_DISABLED) and rule name (restricted-ssh) are diﬀerent. Ensure that the incomingSSH traﬃc for the security groups is accessible. The rule is COMPLIANT if the IP addresses of the incoming SSH traﬃc in the security groups are restricted (CIDR other than 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0). Otherwise, NON_COMPLIANT.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS AppSync APIs are associated with AWS WAFv2 web access control lists (ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for an AWS AppSync API if it is not associated with a web ACL.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are not public. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any Amazon DocumentDB manual cluster snapshots are public.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Bitbucket source repository URL DOES NOT contain sign-in credentials or not. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the URL contains any sign-in information and COMPLIANT if it doesn't.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the Classic Load Balancers use SSL certiﬁcates provided by AWS Certiﬁcate Manager. To use this rule, use an SSL or HTTPS listener with your Classic Load Balancer. Note- this rule is only applicable to Classic Load Balancers. This rule does not check Applicati on Load Balancers and Network Load Balancers.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an account with Amazon EMR has block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if BlockPublicSecurityGroupRules is false, or if true, ports other than Port 22 are listed in Permitted PublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that default ports for SSH/RDP ingress traﬃc for network access control lists (NACLs) are restricted. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a NACL inbound entry allowsa source TCP or UDP CIDR block for ports22 or 3389.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a WAF Global Web ACL contains someWAF rules or rule groups. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Web ACL does not contain any WAF rule or rule group.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF Classic rule group contains some rules. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there are no rules present within a rule group.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS WAF global rule contains some conditions. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if no conditions are present within the WAF global rule.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the AWS Client VPN authorization rules does not authorize connection access for all clients. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'AccessAll' is present and set to true.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that internet gateways are attached to an authorized virtual private cloud (Amazon VPC). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if internet gateways are attached to an unauthorized VPC.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon S3 access points have block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if block public access settings are not enabled for S3 access points.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers protect and separate all customer environments and data. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon API Gateway V2 stages have access logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if 'accessLogSettings' is not present in Stage conﬁguration.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. The rule is COMPLIANT if X-Ray tracing is enabled and NON_COMPLIANT otherwise.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudFront distributions are conﬁgured to deliver access logs to an Amazon S3 bucket. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a CloudFront distribution does not have logging conﬁgured.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that there is at least one AWS CloudTrail trail defined with security best practices. This rule is COMPLIANT if there is at least one trail that meets all of the following: records global service events, is a multi-region trail, has Log file validation enabled, encrypted with a KMS key, records events for reads and writes, records management events, does not exclude any management events.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Neptune cluster has CloudWatch log export enabled for audit logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a Neptune cluster does not have CloudWatch log export enabled for audit logs.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that logConﬁguration is set on active ECS Task Deﬁnitions. This rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an active ECSTaskDeﬁnition does not have the logConﬁguration resource deﬁned or the value for logConﬁguration is null in at least one container deﬁnition.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: For this rule, the rule identiﬁer (CLOUD_TRAIL_ENABLED) and rule name (cloudtrail- enabled) are diﬀerent. Ensure that an AWS CloudTrail trail is enabled in your AWS account. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a trail is not enabled. Optionally, the rule checks a speciﬁc S3 bucket, Amazon Simple Notiﬁcation Service (Amazon SNS) topic, and CloudWatch log group.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Note: for this rule, the rule identiﬁer (MULTI_REGION_CLOUD_TRAIL_ENABLED) and rule name (multi-region-clou dtrail-enabled) are diﬀerent. Ensure that there is at leastone multi-region AWS CloudTrail. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the trails do not match input parameters. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the ExcludeManagementEventSources ﬁeld is not empty or if AWS CloudTrail is conﬁgured to exclude management events such as AWS KMS events or Amazon RDS DataAPI events.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an AWS AppSync API has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging is not enabled, or 'ﬁeldLogLevel' is neither ERROR nor ALL.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that logging is enabled on AWS WAF classic global web access control lists (web ACLs). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT for a global web ACL, if it does not have logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon MQ brokers have Amazon CloudWatch audit logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a broker does not have audit logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon MQ broker has CloudWatch audit logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the broker does not have audit logging enabled.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) cluster is conﬁgured with logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if logging for Amazon EKS clusters is not enabled for alllog types.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Elastic Beanstalk environments are conﬁgured to send logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the valueof `StreamLogs` is false.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Step Functions machine has logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a state machine does not have logging enabled or the logging conﬁguration is not at the minimum level provided.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS Network Firewall ﬁrewalls have logging enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a logging type is not conﬁgured. You can specify which logging type you want the rule to check.

mappings.control_description: Multi-tenant service providers facilitate logging and incident response for all customers. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that you have provided security contact information for your AWS account contacts. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if security contact information within the account is not provided.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS scope is documented and validated. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that automated sensitive data discovery is enabled for Amazon Macie. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if automated sensitive data discovery is disabled. The rule is APPLICABLE for administr ator accounts and NOT_APPLICABLE for member accounts.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS scope is documented and validated. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Macie is enabled in your account per region. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'status' attribute is not set to 'ENABLED'.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS scope is documented and validated. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that automated sensitive data discovery is enabled for Amazon Macie. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if automated sensitive data discovery is disabled. The rule is APPLICABLE for administr ator accounts and NOT_APPLICABLE for member accounts.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS scope is documented and validated. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Macie is enabled in your account per region. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'status' attribute is not set to 'ENABLED'.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. The rule is COMPLIANT if X-Ray tracing is enabled and NON_COMPLIANT otherwise.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your CloudFormation stacks send event notiﬁcations to an Amazon SNS topic. Optionally ensure that speciﬁed Amazon SNS topics are used. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if CloudFormation stacks do not send notiﬁcations.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that detailed monitoring is enabled for EC2 instances. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if detailed monitoring is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudWatch alarms have an action conﬁgured for the ALARM, INSUFFICIENT_DATA, or OK state. Optionally ensure that any actions match a named ARN. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there is no action speciﬁed for the alarm or optional parameter.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a resource type has a CloudWatch alarm for the named metric. For resource type,you can specify EBS volumes, EC2 instances, Amazon RDS clusters, or S3 buckets. The rule is COMPLIANT if the named metric has a resource ID and CloudWatch alarm.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudWatch alarms with the given metric name have the speciﬁed settings.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudWatch security metrics collection on AWS WAFv2 rule groups is enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'VisibilityConﬁg.CloudWatchMetricsEnabled' ﬁeld is set to false.

mappings.control_description: PCI DSS is incorporated into business-as- usual (BAU) activities. (PCI-DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Simple Notiﬁcation Service (SNS) logging is enabled for the delivery status of notiﬁcation messages sent to a topic for the endpoints. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the delivery status notiﬁcation for messages is not enabled.

mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon S3 access points have block public access settings enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if block public access settings are not enabled for S3 access points.

mappings.control_description: Logical access to the cardholder data environment is controlled and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that the required public access block settings are conﬁgured from account level. The rule is only NON_COMPLIANT when the ﬁelds set below do not match the corresponding ﬁelds in the conﬁguration item.

mappings.control_description: Logical access to the cardholder data environment is controlled and managed. (PCI-DSS- v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that MFA Delete is enabled in the Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket versioning conﬁgura tion. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if MFA Delete is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that AWS X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. The rule is COMPLIANT if X-Ray tracing is enabled and NON_COMPLIANT otherwise.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that your CloudFormation stacks send event notiﬁcations to an Amazon SNS topic. Optionally ensure that speciﬁed Amazon SNS topics are used. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if CloudFormation stacks do not send notiﬁcations.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that detailed monitoring is enabled for EC2 instances. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if detailed monitoring is not enabled.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudWatch alarms have an action conﬁgured for the ALARM, INSUFFICIENT_DATA, or OK state. Optionally ensure that any actions match a named ARN. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if there is no action speciﬁed for the alarm or optional parameter.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that a resource type has a CloudWatch alarm for the named metric. For resource type,you can specify EBS volumes, EC2 instances, Amazon RDS clusters, or S3 buckets. The rule is COMPLIANT if the named metric has a resource ID and CloudWatch alarm.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that CloudWatch alarms with the given metric name have the speciﬁed settings.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon CloudWatch security metrics collection on AWS WAFv2 rule groups is enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the 'VisibilityConﬁg.CloudWatchMetricsEnabled' ﬁeld is set to false.

mappings.control_description: Suspicious events are identiﬁed and responded to. (PCI- DSS-v4.0)
mappings.guidance: Ensure that Amazon Simple Notiﬁcation Service (SNS) logging is enabled for the delivery status of notiﬁcation messages sent to a topic for the endpoints. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the delivery status notiﬁcation for messages is not enabled.
